tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
    plant_id INT,
    plant_name VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(255),
    emission_category VARCHAR(255),
    emission_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE industrial_plants (
    plant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    emission_type VARCHAR(50),
    emission_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE industrial_plants (
    plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    emissions FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    emission_date DATE,
    emission_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES industrial_plants(plant_id)
)

CREATE TABLE industry_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    industry_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE plant_employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES industrial_plants(plant_id)
)

CREATE TABLE plant_capacity (
    capacity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT,
    capacity FLOAT,
    capacity_unit VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES industrial_plants(plant_id)
)
